DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Asia . The aim observational study investigate safety efficacy insulin detemir add-on therapy type 2 diabetic patient use oral antidiabetic drug .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Type 2 Diabetic Patients Oral Antidiabetic Drugs Basal Insulin Near East Countries
DOC.criteria: After physician decision make use insulin detemir therapy , subject Type 2 diabetes treat one oral antidiabetic drug ( metformin , SU , repaglinide , TZDs ) eligible study . The selection subject discretion individual physician . Particular attention pay drug interaction list within product label Subjects currently treat insulin detemir insulin regimen include regular ( bolus ) insulin Subjects hypersensitivity insulin detemir excipients Women pregnant , breast feeding intention become pregnant within next 6 month . Women childbearing potential use adequate contraceptive method
